General.Name: Fujian SBS Zipper Science Tech
General.Description: Fujian SBS Zipper Science&Technology Co., Ltd research, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets zippers under the SBS brand in China and internationally. The company offers plastic, metal, recycle, waterproof, and coil zippers; snap, sewing, resin, natural, jeans, and prong snap buttons; pant jooks, labels, metal buckles, jean rivets, eyelets, cord locks and ends; and sliders and pullers. It also exports its products. Fujian SBS Zipper Science&Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, China.
General.Address: Wulou Goudong Industrial Zone, Jinjiang, China
